ships.name: Light Freighter
ships.bonus:
Gain 1 extra Material when completing a delivery Mission.
• If the mission is on Moon: gain also+1 Influence.
ships.flavor: The workhorse of the inner system trade routes.

ships.name: Light People Carrier
ships.bonus: Gain one extra population on the planet
ships.flavor: Built for short trips and daily commutes — nothing more, nothing less.

infrastructure.name: Habitat Module
infrastructure.bonus: Gain 1 Population each turn if placed on a colonized Planet.
infrastructure.flavor: Home away from home, with 0.3g gravity and filtered views of Saturn's rings.

infrastructure.name: Transport Grid
infrastructure.bonus: For each pair of habitat in the planet, gain +1 population (and when new pairs of habitat are cnstructed)

mission.name: Moon Water Rush
mission.flavor: Water is the new oil—and Lunar deposits are booming.

astronaut.name: Rover Pilot
astronaut.bonus: May reroll 1 failed exploration attempt per turn.
astronaut.flavor: If it's dusty, broken, and on fire — that's when I shine.

Sipre.name: Survey Shuttle NX-1
Sipre.bonus: Gain 1 Exploration Point each time a new Planet is discovered.

Sipre.name: Founder's Bonus
Sipre.bonus: At the beginning of game, take 5 additional SpaceCoins and draw 1 Tech card.

Sipre.name: Orbital Data Grid
Sipre.bonus: When you accomplish a Mission, gain 1 Influence.
Sipre.flavor: Nothing gets done without the Grid.

technology_cards.name: Genetic Uplift Lab
technology_cards.bonus: Gain 1 extra Population during each Income Phase.
technology_cards.flavor: Evolve or die — preferably in the lab.

event_cards.name: Solar Flare
event_cards.bonus: All Infrastructure abilities are disabled this turn.
event_cards.flavor: When the sun sneezes, we all catch fire.

event_cards.name: Trade Surge
event_cards.flavor: The stars have never been so open for business.

event_cards.name: Volcanic Eruption
event_cards.bonus: Each player roll a dice, if the result is 4 or more, they can't launch rockets from this planet
